ovdesc.p: The purpose of this table is to define Group Level conditions for the calculation and application of interest, charges and APR (TEG).
The defined conditions are then used as defaults to the corresponding Groups of Accounts and can be overriden with special conditions for individual Groups.

This is the Condition Group Number defined in the Account General Condition table plus a date.

The value of this field is used as part of the key to records defining conditions for the calculation and application of interest and charges for the corresponding Group of Accounts in the GROUP.DEBIT.INT, GROUP.CREDIT.INT and GROUP.CAPITALISATION tables.
a) 1 - 2 numeric character Account General Condition code. b) '.' (Mandatory if numeric date entered, otherwise not input). c) 1 - 9 date characters (Optional input. Default is today's date.)
